Phrases for direction of difference

Source: R/trend-terms.R
trend_terms.Rd

Phrases for direction of difference

trend_terms(more = "increase", less = "decrease", same = "difference")

Arguments

more

string to use when x > y

less

string to use when x < y

same

string to use when x == y

See also

compare_values()

Examples

trend_terms(same = "no change")
#> $more
#> [1] "increase"
#> 
#> $less
#> [1] "decrease"
#> 
#> $same
#> [1] "no change"
#> 

headline(
  x = c(9, 11),
  y = 10,
  headline = "{trend} by {delta_p}%",
  trend_phrases = trend_terms("higher", "lower")
)
#> [1] "lower by 10%"  "higher by 10%"
